title: Replaced Laravel Echo Server with Laravel Reverb

changes.change: Replaced the backend of route synchronisation from Laravel Echo Server to Laravel Reverb. Echo Server has been abandoned for a long time, and setup was VERY cumbersome. Reverb is a lot simpler and cleaner. In the end it works the same so no changes are visible..
Fixed various smaller crashes found by malicious bots.
[Hotfixed] Importing MDT strings is now functional again.
